text: The 2017–18 La Liga season, also known as LaLiga Santander for sponsorship reasons, was the 87th La Liga season. The season began on 18 August 2017 and ended on 20 May 2018. The fixtures were released on 21 July 2017. Real Madrid were the defending champions. Barcelona, won the league title on 29 April 2018 with four matches left. ==Teams== ===Promotion and relegation (pre-season)=== A total of 20 teams competed in the league: the 17 teams from the 2016–17 season and the 3 promoted teams from the 2016–17 Segunda División.
